title: Ocmulgee National Monument: Be A Junior Ranger
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth     Be A Junior Ranger              Be A Junior Ranger         Junior Ranger Logo NPS  Be a Junior Ranger at Ocmulgee! We have booklets for 6 and under  and 7 and up. Junior Ranger Booklet for 6 and under Junior Ranger Booklet for 7 and up Mail in your Junior Ranger Booklet for a Junior Ranger Badge and Certificate!  Address is: Ocmulgee National Monument 1207 Emery Hwy.  Macon GA 31217
